comment._content: That structure still stands as well. Looks like a view of St. John's Harbour.

comment.author: 87355012@N06
comment._content: This is showing the old jetty and east of that is where the market was orignally located. The Westerby Memorial still stands in the same spot.

comment.author: 87335114@N03
comment._content: Wow....that Westerby Memorial is now where taxis park next to Heritage Quay, I think. Very busy tourist area now. King's casino would be somewhere to the left.

comment._content: The old building in the top photo is what's now the Antigua Grammar School
